message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $20,000. I believe it holds significant value and would be a worthwhile investment for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of your product, but I am only willing to pay up to $15,000 for it. Could we possibly meet in the middle?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $20,000 is my absolute lowest price. I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere for a product of this quality.
